::Prowl::

Prowl doesn't reply to Fireblade, concentrating on watching out for more shots to dodge. If Fireblade had EMP weapons, a close encounted would be suicidal.

The grenades disable the missiles, sending them falling harmlessly to the ground. Prowl growls, firing four laser blasts down at Fireblade and flying toward him. The bot's insult had pissed Prowl off, but he was still careful, ready to angle up in case of more EMP grenades.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::FireBlade::
> "Bah you and you infernal flying and shooting missiles....come fight
> like a warrior you panzy mechaninic" FireBlade yells at Prowl.
> 
> He continues running this time as he fires three more EMP grenades in
> arc hoping to screw up the homing sensors of the missiles....
